title: Love in a Loop
overview: The rude and narcissistic boss Bai Zhen Xiang is constantly dying due to the dissatisfaction of his employees. Every time he dies, the time is reset to the same day, which causes his employee Lilu To be trapped in a time loop. To break out of the time loop, Lu Do had to make contact with Zhen Xiang, who drives her crazy, try her best to change him, save him, until she eventually falls in love with him.
